content.prompt: While the exact function and meaning of such works remain unknown, scholars have theorized that they were intended to facilitate a connection between the physical and spiritual worlds because of the

choices.label: open cavity in the center, which likely served as a place to hold ritual offerings
interlocking square and cylindrical forms, which are believed to symbolize different realms
finely incised lines, which may have helped individuals to identify and interpret constellations in the night sky
dragon motifs, since dragons were believed to be messengers from the gods

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
